docs.snippet: Nicknamed "Old Pueblo," Tucson, Ariz., is a city with many faces. It's a college town. It's an artist town. It's even still a Wild West town. Every February, southern Arizona's biggest city, located 115 miles (185 kilometers) below Phoenix, keeps ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Nicknamed "Old Pueblo," Tucson, Ariz., is a city with many faces. It's a college town. It's an artist town. It's even still a Wild West town. Every February, southern Arizona's biggest city, located 115 miles (185 kilometers) below Phoenix, keeps schools open on President's Day but closes them later in the week for the annual Tucson Rodeo Parade.

headline.main: Tucson, Ariz.: 5 Free Things to See and Do

docs.abstract: Chokwe Lumumba, civil rights lawyer who once called for an independent black-majority country in the American Southeast, and who easily won election as mayor of Jackson, Miss, in 2013, dies at age 66.

docs.snippet: Language can be loaded, and perhaps there is no more loaded word in our culture than the so-called n-word. Here we aim to help students think critically about the word, its history, who says it, who shouldn’t say it and whether it should be buri...
docs.abstract: Language can be loaded, and perhaps there is no more loaded word in our culture than the so-called n-word. Here we aim to help students think critically about the word, its history, who says it, who shouldn’t say it and whether it should be buried or reclaimed.

headline.main: Text to Text | ‘Huckleberry Finn’ and ‘In Defense of a Loaded Word’
